abstract: Former Clinton Correctional Facility worker Joyce E Mitchell, pleading guilty to helping convicted murderers Richard W Matt and David Sweat escape in June, says she was caught up in dark fantasy with them; she smuggled tools into prison for them that they then used to break out; her confession details how deeply involved she was with two prisoners and how greatly detailed their escape scheme was.
lead_paragraph: Joyce E. Mitchell detailed to investigators how she helped convicted killers Richard W. Matt and David Sweat break out of a New York prison.

headline.main: Prison Worker Who Aided Escape Tells of Sex, Saw Blades and Deception
headline.print_headline: Escape Helper Tells of Favors, Sex and Deceit

snippet: Joyce E. Mitchell detailed to investigators how she helped convicted killers Richard W. Matt and David Sweat break out of a New York prison.
